name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Experienced Senior WebTest Engineer with 13+ years in full-stack development and a strong focus on testing high-performance applications. Proficient in **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **React**, with hands-on experience using **Playwright**, **Selenium**, and **Django** for comprehensive application testing. Adept at leveraging **SQL Alchemy**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Redis** for backend development and testing environments.

Skilled in cloud deployment and infrastructure management with **Azure**, **GCP**, **Heroku**, and utilizing **k8s**, **Terraform**, and **Helm** for seamless CI/CD and orchestration. Committed to Agile methodologies, enhancing team collaboration and project efficiency.

Specialized in AI/ML-powered platform integration for predictive analytics and real-time processing, ensuring compliance with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Proven track record in developing and maintaining robust microservices and event-driven architectures, while leading quality assurance initiatives across healthcare and financial sectors.
